name: r1337-linux-base
description: Confgure basic settings, packages and services on Linux servers
long_description: This Chef cookbook will configure some basic system settings, add/remove some common packages, and deploy standard configurations for some common services

recipes.r1337-linux-base::default: Call this recipe to run the various tweaks from the cookbook
recipes.r1337-linux-base::prereqs: Called by default. Run all the prerequisites to system management
recipes.r1337-linux-base::bash: Called by default. Configures the custom bash profile
recipes.r1337-linux-base::thefuck: Called by default. Installs and configures thefuck
recipes.r1337-linux-base::ntp: Called by default. Installs and configures ntp for the New York timezone
